testCases.name: Functional Application Test
testCases.description: Verify the application has actual functionality beyond basic placeholder
steps: Navigate to application homepage
Verify multiple interactive elements exist (navigation menu, buttons, forms, links)
Check for proper navigation structure with working routes
Verify application shows real image showcase features, not just placeholder content
Confirm the app loads without console errors
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application shows functional image showcase platform with navigation, authentication options, and content areas
testCases.failureCondition: If page only shows basic placeholder content or 'Vite + React' text, this test should FAIL

testCases.name: Navigation Functionality Test
testCases.description: Test that navigation menu and routing work correctly
steps: Check top navigation bar is visible and properly styled
Verify 'Explore' link navigates to explore page
Verify 'Featured' link navigates to featured galleries
Test 'Log In' and 'Sign Up' links navigate to authentication page
Confirm logo/home link returns to homepage
Verify responsive navigation on mobile viewport
testCases.expectedOutcome: All navigation links work correctly and pages load without errors

testCases.name: Authentication UI Test
testCases.description: Test authentication forms and UI elements
steps: Navigate to /auth page
Verify login form is present with email and password fields
Check registration form is accessible
Test form validation (empty fields, invalid email format)
Verify proper error messages display for validation failures
Check loading states during form submission
testCases.expectedOutcome: Authentication forms are functional with proper validation and user feedback

testCases.name: Homepage Content Test
testCases.description: Verify homepage displays meaningful content and showcases
steps: Load homepage and check for main heading 'Explore Showcases'
Verify descriptive text about the platform is present
Check for showcase grid layout
Look for image thumbnails and showcase titles
Verify 'View Gallery' links are present on showcase cards
Check loading spinner appears while fetching data
testCases.expectedOutcome: Homepage displays professional image showcase platform with grid of showcases

testCases.name: Responsive Design Test
testCases.description: Test responsive design across different screen sizes
steps: Test desktop view (1920x1080)
Test tablet view (768x1024)
Test mobile view (375x667)
Verify navigation adapts to screen size
Check showcase grid adjusts columns appropriately
Ensure text remains readable at all sizes
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application displays correctly across all device sizes with proper responsive behavior

testCases.name: Image Showcase Display Test
testCases.description: Test image showcase display and interaction
steps: Navigate to explore page
Verify showcase cards display with images
Check showcase titles and descriptions are visible
Test clicking on showcase cards
Verify image loading and display quality
Check for proper fallback if images fail to load
testCases.expectedOutcome: Image showcases display correctly with proper metadata and interaction

testCases.name: Protected Routes Test
testCases.description: Test that protected routes redirect unauthenticated users
steps: Navigate to /upload without authentication
Verify redirect to login page occurs
Navigate to /dashboard without authentication
Verify redirect to login page occurs
Navigate to /notifications without authentication
Verify redirect to login page occurs
testCases.expectedOutcome: Unauthenticated users are redirected to login page when accessing protected routes

testCases.name: Loading States Test
testCases.description: Test loading indicators and states throughout the application
steps: Check initial app loading spinner
Verify showcase loading spinner on homepage
Test authentication loading states
Check loading indicators during navigation
Verify proper loading states for API calls
testCases.expectedOutcome: Loading indicators appear appropriately and provide good user experience

testCases.name: Error Handling Test
testCases.description: Test error handling and user feedback
steps: Test network error scenarios
Verify error messages display for failed API calls
Check 404 page handling for invalid routes
Test form validation error messages
Verify graceful degradation when features fail
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application handles errors gracefully with appropriate user feedback

testCases.name: Footer Content Test
steps: Scroll to bottom of any page
Verify footer is present and visible
Check footer contains appropriate links or information
Verify footer styling is consistent with design
testCases.expectedOutcome: Footer is present and contains appropriate content

testCases.name: Search Functionality Test
steps: Look for search input or functionality
Test search with various keywords
Verify search results display correctly
Check search result filtering and sorting
Test empty search results handling
testCases.expectedOutcome: Search functionality works correctly and returns relevant results

testCases.name: Performance Test
testCases.description: Test application performance and load times
steps: Measure initial page load time
Check for unnecessary network requests
Verify images load efficiently
Test navigation speed between pages
Check for memory leaks during extended use
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application loads quickly and performs well during normal usage

testCases.name: Accessibility Test
steps: Check for proper heading hierarchy (h1, h2, h3)
Verify images have alt text
Test keyboard navigation
Check color contrast ratios
Verify screen reader compatibility

testCases.name: Social Features UI Test
steps: Look for like buttons on images/showcases
Check for comment sections or forms
Verify follow/unfollow buttons on profiles
Test notification indicators
Check social interaction feedback
testCases.expectedOutcome: Social features are visible and provide appropriate user interaction

testCases.name: Upload UI Test
steps: Navigate to upload page (if authenticated)
Verify file upload interface is present
Check for image preview functionality
Test form fields for title, description, tags
Verify upload progress indicators
testCases.expectedOutcome: Upload interface is functional and user-friendly
